r.s: PHP bindings to rrd tool system
r.d: Procedural and simple OO wrapper for rrdtool - data logging and graphing system for time series data.
r.n: - better default time parameter handling for RRDUpdater:update - zend_string in zend_parse_parameter if possible - 'p' for paths in zend_parse_parameter (remi) - zend_object must be the last member of the own object struct - uggh - (remi) - PHP_FE_END instead of 3 times NULL in zend_function_entry - uggh - (remi) - zend_object_properties_size() usage (remi) - size_t for string parameters length (remi) - huge thanks to remi :)
